div.p: What is this IG about (in non-expert friendly terms).
Additional detail/context setting for those who have significant background in the domain. (Try to make as understandable as you can, but set important context).
The main sections of this IG are:

ul.li: Use Cases and Work Flows - describes intended uses of a digital protocol that follows this specification.
Information Models - The structure of Protocol information seen from different viewpoints
Mappings - Guidance converting the sections of a protocol into FHIR
Downloads - Allows downloading a copy of this implementation guide and other useful information
